info.title: GiftCard API
info.description:
>ℹ️ Check the new [Payments onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/payments-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Payments and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey.

The Gift Card is a payment method configured as a cash value associated with a client. It is used to grant a discount on the value of the order at the store. A Gift Card works as a **payment method**, **not a promotion**.

>⚠️ All GiftCard API endpoints are limited to 500 concurrent requests and 5000 requests per minute.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

post.description:
Creates a GiftCard for a specific user.

## Warning

- The field `profileId` should be filled with a value that identifies the client. It is the ID itself.
- The field `expiringDate` should be filled in ISO 8601 format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff`.

>ℹ️️ The `redemptionCode` field for a GiftCard is auto-generated on the creation and cannot be set to an arbitrary value.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant.

relationName.description: Represents the relationship between the client and the store.

expiringDate.description: It must be in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff` (ISO 8601 format).

caption.description: Field to be filled in if a loyalty program must be created for the Giftcard.

restrictedToOwner.description: The Giftcard can only be used for a specified client's ID.

multipleCredits.description: The Giftcard balance can be changed.

multipleRedemptions.description: The Giftcard can be used to make new purchases until its value is completely used.

balance.description: Giftcard current balance. For Gift Cards newly created, the balance will be 0.0.

relationName.description: Field to be filled in when it is not necessary to use a loyalty program for the GiftCard. Observation: A new `relationNamevalue` is required for each new Giftcard to be created.

caption.description: Field to be filled in if a loyalty program must be created for the Gift Card.

operation.description: Type of operation. Possible values are: `Debit` or `Credit`.

requestId.description: Request identification of the transaction. You need to send a different `requestId`value every time you make a new transaction. If you send the same `requestId`two or more times with a specific `redemptionCode`or `redemptionToken`, the GiftCard balance will not be updated.

id.description: The ID of the SKU in VTEX platform.

shippingDiscount.description: Discount to be applied for the shipping value.

PriceTag.description: Array of price tags, each of which, modifies the price in some way, like discounts or rates that apply to the item in the context of the order.

document.description: Document number informed by the customer.

isCorporate.description: `true` if the customer is a legal entity.

receiverName.description: Name of the person who is going to receive the order.

number.description: Number of the building, house or apartment in the shipping address.

complement.description: Complement to the shipping address in case it applies.

reference.description: Complement that might help locate the shipping address more precisely in case of delivery.
